title: So Lucian can't Zhonya's while he's ulting.

replies.body: Fun fact, if Liss ults him while he's ulting it will still continue though. Its basically a hourglass ;)

but liss ult is an untargetable suppress not a status when cast on enemy champs

same with tahm w, but zhonya and bards ult, because they are both a status effect, they stop it
